title: Why are humans so tied together with violent tendencies? - Quora

This is known as toxic masculinity which translates to male insecurity. So insecurity is the worst and ugliest thing because it makes humans do the ugliest things. Neo Nazis blame Jews for their problems in life, they are jealous that they don't have the same success as them and think they're going to be “replaced” by them. Again, it goes back to insecurity and low self-esteem.

Human males are significantly larger and stronger than Human Females. In Nature this sort of sexual dimorphism means only one thing.
